import React from "react"; import "./NewClasses.css"; const gcCode1 = "659323" const gcCode2 = "3423232" const gcCode3 = "333i39i" export default function NewClasses() { return (

Summer Classes

How Do I Sign Up?

3 Easy Steps

Scroll through this page to find the class or classes you want

Open up Google Classroom with your PERSONAL email

Add a Class using the class code provided in each description down below

Chemistry

In this course, we will study the matter that makes up everything around us. We will study its properties, how it combines, how it changes, and how it interacts with surrounding matter. We will also learn about the physical laws governing these interactions, and how we can predict the results of these interactions. This course follows a high school Chemistry curriculum, and it is helpful to have a basic understanding of algebra.

{/* */}

Intended Ages: Grades 5-10

Lead Instructor: Christian Kim

Prerequisites: None!

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

p2h7hvu

Biology

In this class, we will discuss the fundamentals of the human body and follow the curriculum for Biology & in the future AP Biology.

{/* */}

Intended Ages: Grades 6-10

Lead Instructor: Aniketh Prasad

Prerequisites: None!

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

4qtekpr

Competition Math

Provides the problem-solving skills needed for competition math problems from the AMC 8 and Mathcounts.

{/* */}

Intended Ages: Grades 5-8

Lead Instructor: Katherine Liu

Prerequisites: Prealgebra

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

diwgc7t

PreCalc/Calc

{/*

Coming Soon!

*/} {/* */}

Intended Ages: Grades 6-10

Lead Instructor: Daniel Lee

Prerequisites: Algebra

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

vboo6ss

Geometry/Algebra

Introductory course about the fundamentals of Algebra 1 and Geometry. We will focus on solving different types of equations in algebra and on proofs in geometry. This will provide the foundation for IM1, IM2, and the beginning of IM3 in the Common Core Curriculum

{/* */}

Intended Ages: Grades 5-10

Lead Instructor: Justin Liu

Prerequisites: Prealgebra

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

h6clzjs

Intro to Coding

In this course we will be covering the basics of coding through learning java and going through the AP Computer Science course. By the end of the course students will know the main concepts of coding which will help in learning any language moving forward.

{/* */}

Intended Ages: Grades 5-10

Lead Instructor: Aryan Mathur

Prerequisites: Pre-algebra

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

ps665uc

Physics

In this course, we will study the basics of Newtonian mechanics, and develop some of the mindset needed to approach Physics problems. This course approximately follows the first ~2/3 of AP Physics 1 and requires some basic [math] skills, including Algebra, basic Geometry, Trigonometry, and a willingness to learn.

Intended Ages: Grades 5-10

Lead Instructor: Karan Gurazada

Prerequisites: Algebra, Geometry, Trigonometry

Sign up with the Classroom Code:

dekgelg
